sections.name: Elder Elemental Tsunami
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Aquatic
traits.text: Aquatic creatures are at home underwater. Their bludgeoning and slashing unarmed Strikes don’t take the usual –2 penalty for being underwater. Aquatic creatures can breathe water but not air.

traits.name: Elemental
traits.text: Elementals are creatures directly tied to an element and native to the Elemental Planes. Elementals don’t need to breathe.

traits.name: Water
traits.text: Effects with the water trait either manipulate or conjure water. Those that manipulate water have no effect in an area without water. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of water or have a magical connection to the element. Planes with this trait are mostly liquid, perhaps with pockets of breathable air.

interaction_abilities.name: Water-Bound
interaction_abilities.text: When not touching water, the elemental tsunami is slowed 1 and can't use reactions.

automatic_abilities.name: Vortex
automatic_abilities.text: aura, water) 50 feet. Water in the area that is in the same body of water as the elemental tsunami is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don't have the water trait.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

affliction.name: Blinding Sickness

traits.name: Disease
traits.text: An effect with this trait applies one or more diseases. A disease is typically an affliction.

affliction.context: A creature that takes damage from an elder elemental tsunami's wave Strike or Surge is exposed to blinding sickness.

ability.name: Drench

traits.name: Abjuration
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the abjuration school of magic, typically involving protection or wards.

traits.name: Primal
traits.text: This magic comes from the primal tradition, connecting to the natural world and instinct. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Water
traits.text: Effects with the water trait either manipulate or conjure water. Those that manipulate water have no effect in an area without water. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of water or have a magical connection to the element. Planes with this trait are mostly liquid, perhaps with pockets of breathable air.

ability.text: The elemental puts out all fires in a 20-foot emanation. It extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to counteract magical fires (+20 counteract modifier).

ability.name: Surge
ability.text: The elemental tsunami quickly expands its space to fill the area of its vortex. Creatures within the vortex's emanation take 6d12+8 bludgeoning damage (DC 34 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails this save is Pushed 20 feet. The elemental tsunami then retracts to its former space. The elemental tsunami can't Surge again for 1d4 rounds.
